gr.auth.csd.taskmanager

Class MemoryQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.auth.csd.taskmanager.MemoryQuery

  • public class MemoryQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper static methods Class for acquiring internal and external memory info.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemoryQuery() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long[] freeMemory()
      Method that returns the free memory of the device in bytes.
      static long[] occupiedMemory()
      Method that returns the occupied memory of the device in bytes.
      static long[] totalMemory()
      Method that returns the total available memory of the device in bytes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemoryQuery

        public MemoryQuery()

    • Method Detail

      • totalMemory

        public static long[] totalMemory()
        Method that returns the total available memory of the device in bytes.
        Returns:
        a long array, with two integers. The first one is the internal memory, while the second one is the external one.

      • freeMemory

        public static long[] freeMemory()
        Method that returns the free memory of the device in bytes.
        Returns:
        a long array, with two integers. The first one is the internal memory, while the second one is the external one.

      • occupiedMemory

        public static long[] occupiedMemory()
        Method that returns the occupied memory of the device in bytes.
        Returns:
        a long array, with two integers. The first one is the internal memory, while the second one is the external one.
